website_summaries.verdict: Organic, herbal tea to naturally improve fertility.
pros: Loved for its pleasant, sweet taste
Drug, sugar, and caffeine-free blend of 7 herbs scientifically proven to promote fertility
Multiple reports of conceiving just after 1 month of daily intake
cons: While not resulting in pregnancy for some women, it did help with PMS and cycle regulation
Not recommended if you’re not a fan of stevia sweetener

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid thirties and have been trying for several months to get pregnant. Ordered this and drank at least one to two cups a day from the start of my period until a few days after ovulation. Not sure if it's coincidence or this but it took just one cycle after starting this to get pregnant. I have also been taking prenatal vitamins for months. Good luck everyone. Also love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This tea works!!! 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for baby #2 since 2014 with irregular period it was difficult. I started searching for fertility anything and i saw this and decide to try base on all the reviews i read. I bought 2 tins and received them on Jan 11, 2019. I started drinking it twice a day sometimes once. Feb 2019 my period came on time which was lovely and then Mar 2019 it didn't. I Did a test and surprisingly it was POSITIVE. This tea is the best and ot also taste very good. Good luck to those who are trying!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taiedra

customer_reviews.title: Best product!
customer_reviews.text: I will forever swear by this product. My husband and I had been trying to conceive for 6 months. I figured let me try this before we go back to the doctor and go the fertility medicine route like we had with our son. Well we tried it and I finally ovulated and we conceived on the first try. Our pink stork baby is due late September. We have since recommended to all our friends who are currently trying for children. Michaela
customer_reviews.author: William I

customer_reviews.title: True believer!
customer_reviews.text: I drank it the day before, the day of, and the day after my predicted ovulation. Two weeks later and I'm pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great product I Recommend this and patience and prayer
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY ENJOYED THIS PRODUCT. I HAVE BEEN STRUGGLING WITH FERTILITY FOR A WHILE. I TOOK THIS ONE MONTH ALONG WITH MY FERTILITY MEDS FROM DR AND IM EXPECTING BABY DUE JAN 18 2019
customer_reviews.author: shauna124

customer_reviews.title: ... didn't expect this to work but the tea tasted amazing so I was still happy with the product but ...
customer_reviews.text: Well if I'm being honest I didn't expect this to work but the tea tasted amazing so I was still happy with the product but then as I ordered the second container of tea I got half way thru it and found out I was pregnant and we had been trying for awhile with no luck.. I feel as though this tea really helped
customer_reviews.author: rebecca smith

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this tea really helped. I was on birth control for 7 years. I stopped pill and was told it would take 6 months to a year for me to regulate and be able to get pregnant. I started drinking this tea right away. After one month of tea I was pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for not even a month and was got pregnant! Before this product my husband and I tried for 3 years to get pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Reed

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This was just delivered on Monday.. So I've been drinking it for only 4 days. Regardless if I get pregnant soon as a result of drinking this tea, I had to give a 5 star review for the amazing taste! Update... After drinking for just one month, I am pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Terrell

customer_reviews.title: This tea is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. If you’re trying to conceive I 100% recommend this tea! I started drinking it on September 24, 2018 and on October 17th I found out I was pregnant! I got pregnant on the very first try while drinking this and I’ve never been more impressed with a product!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bland

customer_reviews.title: Loved this tea!
customer_reviews.text: I had been trying to get pregnant for 5 months with no luck so I decided to give this tea a shot. I have very regular periods but figured I had nothing to lose. Started drinking it right after my period ended and I got pregnant that cycle! I’m guessing the tea helped somehow. Would drink two 8oz cups a day and really enjoyed the taste, I didn’t think it was too sweet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s witchcraft but I’m pregnant! Haha
customer_reviews.author: cinthia

customer_reviews.title: This product was awesome!! It not only tasted great
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome!! It not only tasted great, but it definitely boosted my fertility. Within one month of drinking the tea, I was pregnant! I will be buying this again when it's time for baby 2!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Received my pink stork tea, and was absolutely floored by the taste. One of the best tasting “fertility” teas out there. Trust me, I’ve tried a few. Best part, I actually ovulated for the first time in MONTHS upon trying this out. Forever thankful ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Riley K.

customer_reviews.title: IM PREGNANT WITH THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying for 2 1/2 years and I've been on fertility meds since last December and I kid you not I'm pregnant from the first month of using this!! Idk if it's a coincidence or not but I am. I started drinking this right after my period (I didnt know about the product) and drank it till the day of ovulation. I drank one to two cups a day. The only complain I have is that it has stevia and so it's too sweet for me. Personally I'm not a big fan of stevia. But try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Asuzena

customer_reviews.title: Just ordering it got me pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this product to try because we had been trying for over a year to get pregnant and had no luck. We had this on our shelf and I was waiting for my next period so I could start taking it and not even 3 weeks later we got a positive pregnancy test and i'm now 5 and a half months pregnant with our little girl! I definitely reccomend this product because just looking at it got me pregnant!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: We are pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from PCOS and been trying for 7 years...Finally decided to take action ..and wanted to try something Natural. I came across Pink Stork Fertility Tea. I started taking it right after my cycle had ended. I ovulated right on time and now I found out I am pregnant. This tea is a blessing. and thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Duchaine

customer_reviews.title: Sincerely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this tea. I never expected any miracles however my cycle was normal and after drinking this tea I never ovulated last month and when I missed my period hoping I was pregnant I realized after taking a few pregnancy tests that I was not pregnant and never even ovulated. I would absolutely not recommend this tea especially if you already have regular cycles. It’s hard enough to see the negative sign on the pregnancy test, but I’ve been crying and depressed for weeks now hoping it didn’t do long term damage and I will get back to ovulating and be able to conceive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does seem to regulate my cycle
customer_reviews.text: Last month was the first month I drank this fertility tea. It has a really nice flavor, so it’s easy to get your 2cups a day. When using this tea, I was finally able to get an obvious positive LH ovulation test, and while I’m not pregnant yet, it took my cycles from 25 back to 28 days. I will definitely continue to use this tea and hope for good things!!
customer_reviews.author: I Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: 20 stars
customer_reviews.text: Can I give this tea a 20 stars please? I cannot be anymore grateful! I have PCOS and we’ve been trying to get pregnant for about 7 months. We’d even attempted one IUI before covid put us on a two month break. Well, back to trying this month and decided to try this tea along this cycle. BOOM! I’m four weeks pregnant! Also, the tea flavor is amazing and so easy to drink. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: joannathegreat

customer_reviews.title: THIS TEA WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been trying to conceive for at least 1year and after drinking this tea for a couple days here and there in OCT. I am now 7weeks pregnant i would certainly recommend this to anyone looking for QUICK results i mean WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Stopped ovulating after using this two months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped me from ovulating. 😭 Period lasted a day longer and had bad cramps and cramps after period. Now will take that much longer to get cycle back on track.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy must try
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for alternatives to birth control for years. After having a tubal in September of 2011 the pain had become unbearable. This tea has a lot of herbs that help with moods and PMS in general. Tea has a sweet taste no sugar is needed. Latley I've noticed changes in my mood an food cravings. After 10 days of drinking tea twice a day i just had a positive pregnancy test. This tea increases fertility great buy
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Already balancing my hormones after just 5 days!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because my cycles were completely out of whack after having my IUD removed. For 6 months my cycles were 50+ days apart. I started drinking this tea on day 23 of my cycle and on day 28 Aunt Flow arrived. I can’t believe it worked that fast. My face and back are clearing up from the constant breakouts I was experiencing from my crazy hormones. We aren’t trying to conceive just yet but I will keep using this product until we do. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! No matter where you are in your journey for a baby try this product you have nothing to lose! I tried for 4 years and did 9 months of fertility to get my first son. I am 40 years old and have been trying for over a year this time. I have done everything exactly the same until I tried this tea. I started drinking one cup a night on day 12 of my cycle and 2 weeks later I am pregnant! I am 100% convinced this tea is the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING DO NOT USE-messed up hormones
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a super regular cycle and ovulated on the exact day for almost 6 months. I bought this tea to try the first month my husband and I started trying to conceive because I figured why not try to boost it. BIG MISTAKE! My period is now 5 days late and no I am not pregnant. Something in this tea must have messed up my hormones and cycle... I am really bummed and hope it doesn’t delay our process of conceiving now. There needs to be a warning on this package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My friend used this one month with a Unakite gemstone ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend used this one month with a Unakite gemstone bracelet, and after trying to conceive for 2 years, she conceived after just one month. I am in shock that they worked that well myself... almost too hard to even believe!
customer_reviews.author: MommaCed

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I drank this tea twice a day as well as using the conception blend vitamins and got pregnant in 1 month. I’m now 21 weeks pregnant with an active little boy. I’m thrilled with the results! The tea itself is delicious and the stevia makes it sweet enough without the need to add honey or sugar. A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant on first try!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband have been trying for a second child for more than 9 months. I have a very regular period and have been tracking my period for years. I’m very knowledgeable about when my fertile days are and when I’m about to ovulate, and me and my husband get busy on those days. But this past month, I needed enforcements so I bought Pink Storks Fertility Tea, Preseed, And Pregmates Ovulation and HCG tests. I also stopped drinking coffee and fasted from meat and dairy this month. We had sex in day 12 and 15, I had implantation bleed 4 days before period was to start and tested HCG positive 2 days before period was to start.
customer_reviews.author: ChellyJelly

customer_reviews.title: Taste great! NOT too sweet like others say
customer_reviews.text: Update: PREGNANT!! Starting drinking it about a week and a half before ovulation then stopped after ovulation. Just took a test 3 days before missed period and positive!! This tea taste great! Is NOT to sweet like other buyers have stated, in fact you could even add sugar or honey. Don’t know if it works yet, will update soon hopefully with a positive result! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Knight McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Trying for our little miracle babe
customer_reviews.text: So, 4 stars on taste alone. I like that it's not overpowering and makes me feel very relaxed. Kind of a two-fer if you have a little anxiety...and this is coming from a starbs coffee girl. Without tmi my bf and I are trying for a miracle baby. Been a tough road for us. I drank this tea during my fertile window last month but we didn't get a chance to "do the deed" near ovulation, Drank the tea again this month during the window and tested with OPK. Will update when I get a bfp. Send us baby dust!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Black

customer_reviews.title: I started drinking it the day of my predicted window started and I fell in love with the taste
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cycle in my trying to conceive journey and I knew I would need some fertility help this time around. I am normally not a tea drinker but everyone told me I needed to get this one. I started drinking it the day of my predicted window started and I fell in love with the taste, since it has been hot I drink it over ice with no sugar added. My LH surge came right in on time so fingers crossed that the baby dust stuck. I am someone with an irregular cycle and I was getting no positive LH surge until I started drinking this tea!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Day

customer_reviews.title: I Can't Believe How Good This Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat skeptical when ordering this, but thought I'd give it a try. My SO and I had only been TTC for a month before I ordered it, but my history of ovarian cysts + my age (mid 30s) I thought I should use every tool available to me. I paired this with primrose oil (2-3x a day for first half of cycle) and I got pregnant on month 2 of TTC. Currently 5 weeks pregnant and will drink this tea throughout the first trimester to ensure hormonal balance.
customer_reviews.author: Sandiegodogmom

customer_reviews.title: Very Calming!
customer_reviews.text: I received this tea exactly a week ago and started drinking it that day because it was the day 2 of my cycle and I have been drinking it ever since. The taste was great, has a nice sweetness to it. It definitely helped to relax me during my cycle and eased the cramping. My husband and I have been trying to conceive for about 9 months now. Patiently waiting for the results of this product. Will update in 4 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: ShakBrow

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever Amazon review. It is fitting that it is for my favorite product that I've ever bought on Amazon. This tea was amazing! I was a 2-3 cups a day coffee drinker and this tea totally turned me on to drinking tea forever. It tastes DELICIOUS, made me ovulate on day 14, made my CM stretchy and the egg white you really want to see (I usually only get wet CM) and now I got a positive pregnancy test at 11 dpo! I was trying for three months. On to the pregnancy tea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need to drink that at list 3 times a day everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Hi everyone. Got pregnant second time. But with second baby I try this for the first time. I did not believe it but this tea works. I just drink for 2 weeks and I got pregnant. I drink this like 4 times a day. It is amazing tea I would recommend to woman who is struggling getting a baby. Based on the comment I thought it was a joke but it really works
customer_reviews.author: Olena Trachuk

customer_reviews.title: Beware!! Terrible Product and Shifts Menstrual Cycle
customer_reviews.text: I was so desperate after several months of trying to conceive that I gave this fertility tea a try. BEWARE! It doesn't provide any of the benefits. My period is extremely regular, however, this "fertility tea" shifted my cycle all over the place. Which is what some other reviewers wrote. The negative reviews are probably more true than the positive reviews. I don't believe the claims made about this product are FDA verified, so it was a useless waste of money and time. I just hope it hasn't done any permanent damage. It's sad when companies take advantage instead of helping people.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.U

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow !!️🤰🏾
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!️ This product really works. I was sooooo skeptical at first considering I been TTC for 4 years and nothing. I have regular periods and never skipped my period. Well I started drinking this mid June, and found out I was pregnant July 30th 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Kiara T.

customer_reviews.title: Pink Stork Fertility Tea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after tieing my tubes having a tubal reversal and trying for 3 1/2 years. Recieved my order June 29,2020. Started drinking the tea June 30,2020. Missed period on July 10,2020. Positive pregnancy test on July 13,2020. Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from a miscarriage on Dec 4,2018 and I decided that in 2019 I was having my rainbow baby. Drinking this tea twice a day along with changing my diet little by little I am now pregnant ! I also started taking prenatales just to prepare my body. I don't know whats the magic in this tea, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: i have a good feeling about this month— UPDATE IM PREGNANT!!!
customer_reviews.text: been ttc with my husband for going on 8 cycles(6 days in)(started tea 3 days ago) with this being my 1st month on the fertility tea. i love the taste for far and I've noticed very light cramping on my right side.. hoping that's a good thing?? note that this will be my 1st month on concieve plus lube, and 2nd month on the couples prenatal pack, will update at the end of the month Update; ovulated on the 14th day and got my first positive in the middle of 10dpo(today!!!) !!!!!!! Good luck ladies!! God is so good <3
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: My God, this year actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant at age 41! I prayed on this tea, I took it for about 2.5 weeks twice a day and stopped right after I was ovulating. I was thinking, maybe next months this will work since it’s only been less than 3 weeks. But, God has other plans! Am shocked and excited, after 6 miscarriage, my body stopped getting pregnant 7 months later am pregnant. Have faith and take this tea, you won’t be disappointed, plus on the package it states “it’s been prayed on” to God be the glory.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Monique

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first month!
customer_reviews.text: I got pregnant the first month I started drinking this tea. I obviously can’t say for certain that this was the reason but we had four months of no success before this. I was charting my bbt and this tea appears to have regulated my hormones very well that month. I’ll definitely use it again next time.
customer_reviews.author: J1234

customer_reviews.title: Flavors Great, it really works
customer_reviews.text: We had been trying for over 6 month took this 3 times a day, between my period and ovulation and I'm already pregnant 🥰 I also had a normal cycle and it didn't mess it up for me at all!! Definitely recommending to friends..
customer_reviews.author: Nelson H.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: It is a sweeter tea but I didn’t find it overpowering. I would recommend brewing 16oz with the tea bag at once instead of using the tea bag twice in 2- 8 oz cups. By doing that you avoid the problem of the first cup being stronger then the next. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E

customer_reviews.title: First month in two years not ovulating
customer_reviews.text: It could have nothing to do with this product but this has been the only change I made this month so I feel it’s worth mentioning. I have used OPKs every cycle for the past two years and have always had a positive at around the same time each month. This is the first month I haven’t gotten a positive and I test 2-3 time daily so I know I didn’t miss my surge. I hope that I’m wrong and the product isn’t to blame but after adding this daily I did not ovulate for the first time since tracking my cycles.
customer_reviews.author: KSwack

customer_reviews.title: Omg it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tea was recommended by a friend and I was quite skeptical. We had been trying for about 6 months with no luck so I was quite discouraged. I had already been to my GYN and found to be healthy with no health issues. So, I drank the tea twice a day during and around my fertility week and received a positive pregnancy test after my first time drinking it. We also had sex everyday during my fertility week too. Currently 4 weeks pregnant. Praying for a safe and full term pregnancy!! Sprinkling baby dust to all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Regular cycle used every two days.
customer_reviews.text: Used this every two days since I have a regular cycle. My husband and I have been trying for 6 months and we’re pregnant the first month after using this tea! Sending all the baby dust !
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT !
customer_reviews.text: I got pregnant the first month drinking this tea ! Instead of doing two seperate cups, I made one big 16oz cup of hot tea at a time. It has a sweet after taste, it didn’t bother me whatsoever and it was not overbearing. If you are TTC I highly recommend this tea!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Started taking this tea twice a day from the first day of my cycle along with geritol multivitamins. After 11 months of trying to conceive with no luck after taking these two together I finally got my positive.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A

customer_reviews.title: Best Results Possible
customer_reviews.text: I am completely in love with this tea, and I’ve been recommending it to my friends with fertility issues. My husband and I tried for 8 years without success, so this year we decided to do IVF. Before starting I found this tea on Amazon and decided to give it a shot. The Drs told us not to expect immediate results since it usually takes a couple cycles. We got pregnant with twins on the first try! I accredit it to having been drinking this tea for months before the treatment.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom18

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to conceive since November 2018 and I had lost all hope until this popped up on my amazon, went ahead and tried it. It was a bit too sweet for me, but it worth it! First cycle and I am pregnant! Let’s just hope this baby is here for a full term and is healthy! Their customer service is great as well and they really care for their customers!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel like there was huge missed opportunity by not calling this “firtili-TEA”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time was a success!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this tea, because I have really bad periods so I was worried that it was going to be difficult for me to get pregnant. I thought it wouldn’t hurt to try, since I love tea anyway! This tea tastes really good, I drank it every night for a month, and the very first time my husband and I decided to stop trying to prevent pregnancy, we got pregnant. I’m not sure if this tea was the exact reason why, but I’m sure it didn’t hurt! And it tasted good either way. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Brandi T

customer_reviews.title: stopped my period
customer_reviews.text: I have regular cycle and been taking this tea for 2 weeks and was also expecting my period, I am now 10 days late & sadly, I'm not pregnant😔. I guess it's not for me😡
customer_reviews.author: PrettyLynn

customer_reviews.title: It worked !
customer_reviews.text: Used this after not being able to conceive on my own and constantly having mid cycle bleeding and not being able to get pregnant I took this during my period and stop a few days before I got a positive opk I didn’t have any mid cycle bleeding after drinking this for 2 weeks and i just found out today that I’m pregnant!! The tea was super yummy for me I enjoyed it warm with honey ! Good luck to you all I definitely recommend this tea
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste and quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my pink stork Friday 7/19, so far I am loving the taste of it. I put sugar and honey in my mine but I realize I actually don’t need to add those because it makes the tea too sweet. My cycle ended on 7/20, so I started drinking it that day. I’ve been drinking the tea everyday, once or twice a day since the 20th. I pray this works, So I can be back with a some greats about a pregnancy update. Peace & blessing ladies. Wish me blessings.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Must have product for pregnancy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and go to a lot of doctors before. They all said it will be difficult for me to get pregnant. So I looked up some conception products online and found out this one. I gave it a try. I drink it before, during and after my period (about 5 days). After that, I got pregnant just in the first time of using. I’m so glad I have bought it and definitely will use it again for my second time. Highly recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth money
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product,I had a misscarige on December then trying to conceive again after ,but fisrt month that I started with this product I got pregnant!!!I’m now pregnant and my due date is November 2019
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Whats really is in this tea??
customer_reviews.text: What the heck is in this tea! I had irregular periods since getting off birth control. My period has been missing for about 5 months. I bought this tea to regulate my period Because it was recommended by a friend. I only drank one cup then just said forget it because im not a tea drinker anyway and dr was going to prescribe me something to get my periods back. Turns out i ovulated for the first time in months 2 days after that one cup and got pregnant. This is not a coincidence it was the tea. We are very happy but this was so unexpected because i only bought the tea to jump start my cycle back.
customer_reviews.author: Shopqueen

customer_reviews.title: Dont like the taste but got pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: So not gonna lie it doesnt taste great but it is tolerable, I mixed it with other teas. I do not drink sweatened tea so thats the main reason it wasnt pleasant for me. It is sweet. BUT I only used this a handful of times and I am now pregnant. Same month i tried it. Not sure if it is the reason but hey.!
customer_reviews.author: Magic batch

customer_reviews.title: Had bugs in the sachets
customer_reviews.text: I received my container in March but did not open it until July due to some health issues I wanted to take care of. When i finally opened it, opened the box it was in and removed the seal and everything, i was boiling water when i noticed IN the sachets were little bugs, little beatle bugs. I searched the other sachets and there were more! The sachet themselves didnt have any holes where the bugs could go in so idk how they got in there. Plus they were still in the box and seal still on. Threw them out obviously.
customer_reviews.author: chanelle

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This tea worked for me. I understand that all women are different. I don’t know if it was the tea alone because I tried castor oil packs along with drinking tea. This combination was very relaxing. I drank the tea while doing the castor oil packs. I began doing both the day that followed the last day of my period. I only did this until my ovulation day. I also tracked when my ovulation took place with a ovulation kit. I used all 3 at 1 time and now I’m pregnant after trying for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this tea on March 21, 2020 and started drinking it the same day. Yesterday (4/21/20) I took a home pregnancy test and it was positive!!!!! I couldn’t believe it! Before this tea, my husband and I had been trying for two years with no luck. I’ve tried other fertility supplements, but nothing worked. Thank you to everyone at pink stork for creating this product. Sending baby dust to all of you who are trying!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I'm Now 3 Months Pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: Ironically it was my husband who suggested we try this tea. I sincerely felt it was all some big joke.....but we stuck to it for about 15 days. Then i kind of forgot we had tried it. I got really "sick" ....Throwing up randomly and getting grossed out from everything....i was alsot 2 months when i found out i was pregnant.....Counting back the weeks i It happend about the last day i drank this tea. So long story short....After a whole year of trying, this tea did the trick. It super sweet (like stevia) but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Do not take with femara.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this tea with my fertility treatments. The tea isn't so bad but I did not know chasteberry was another name for something that goes against femara. Chastebery contradicts femara and I hadn't known because this tea is labeled as Fertility tea. I mean something that's meant to help you shouldn't screw you over. Normally people that would need this tea will be on femara or some sort of fertility drug. I feel that the summary should say not to take it with some fertility drugs because it can counteract the drugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FIRST FREAKING TRY
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my friend who has been trying to get pregnant for a few months. She only has one tube, so she knew it was gonna be harder. After a few months of trying I got her this, just because it was cheaper and I thought why not. She drank it a few days leading up to ovulation and she took at home fertility tests. She had multiple more “high fertility” days and got pregnant the first month drinking this tea. It might be a coincidence, but I see a lot of people saying the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was starting to doubt that this wouldn’t work for me. I was on my second order when I found out I was pregnant during a Pap smear! When I saw those two pink lines I cried. It’s been a year long battle and this tea was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant after 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been been able to get pregnant without Clomid for 5 years. After drinking this for a month I was was pregnant without any medication taken. I used this product and EuNatural Conception Vitamins. I don’t know what did the trick but something did. Now let’s just pray this baby survives!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea in hopes of being the success stories I read about on the reviews prior to purchasing. I drank it as directed on my second month TTC. However, the opposite happened - I am over two weeks late and am not pregnant. I never thought I’d see the day that I would pray for my cycle to start again... but that’s all I am hoping for at this point. The only change I made last month was drinking this tea 2-3 times/daily.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it for a month not with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a month not with child yet. but it does help calm me and regulate my period.
customer_reviews.author: Quantana

customer_reviews.title: Heavy bleeding
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could write a positive review. Unfortunately this product gave me heavy bleeding with 4 days of spotting and 5 days of very heavy bleeding. Very unusual for me. Before that happened customer service promised to send me another package which never happened. It would be useless anyway. I really wish I could write something else.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and I was told getting pregnant was going to be really tough for me. So I started doing research prior to trying and came across Pink Stork. I found this tea and I figured I'd give it a shot. I started drinking it daily every single day 3 months prior to even trying, along with the prenatal vitamin. Well two months of trying and I am pregnant. I think a combo of the pink stork products and changing my diet made the process so quick! I am so grateful I stumbled across Pink Stork! Love this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: Good smell and taste good
customer_reviews.text: This fertility tea comes with 15 pyramid sachets and best is ORGANIC. The tea was delivered yesterday and I drink my first tea at night. I love the smell this tea has. The taste is good also. Try to drink it naturally without adding sugar or honey. I am planning on drinking my tea in the morning. and at night. 2 times a day. I am irregular, hope this helps with irregular period and helps me to get pregnant 🙏🏼🙏🏼. I will leave my second feedback within 1 or 2 months 🙏🏼🙏🏼🙏🏼 For now, I will give 3 stars since Is to early to tell if It works. I will follow up.
customer_reviews.author: daniilsa soto

customer_reviews.title: cramps and dizziness
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to drink this tea and ordered two cans - but I barely drank a cup and started getting terrible cramps and feeling dizzy in my head. dear Pink Stork, i normally love your products but need to request a refund for this tea because if i drink any more i am afraid i will need to see a doctor. still feeling sick and uncomfortable in my belly as i'm writing this review. so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Daria Drozdova

customer_reviews.title: Beware: There are 15 tea bags
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the packaging and title of this tea is very misleading as in the title it states there are “30 cups”, yet when it arrived today I saw that it says in small writing on the front that there are 15 pyramid bags. The tea requires 2 cups of water, therefore makes 30 cups. I feel as if this was a poor marketing tactic and unfair to customers. 15 tea bags for $12 is not worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MLC6293

customer_reviews.title: Great tea.
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling years and at 38 im still wanting that baby! I have been taking the tea for a few days and its super delish. I bought it last month but wanted to wait for this cycle is i didnt concieve last month. I also bought the prenatals and the fertility pills. I swear i feel something brewing. Like i can feel my uterus and ovaries doing some kind of workout. Im taking it as a good sign. Put a little faith and try this. Its organic and its better than putting the meds and chemicals that are cancer causing in your body. Baby dust and prayers to all of us trying!
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bad cramps
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product with all the rave reviews... but, unfortunately, this tea gave me the WORST cramps I have ever had in my life (I have a really high pain tolerance) after I drank it. I tried it a couple times to be sure that’s what it was, and it was definitely the tea. The cramps were so bad that I had difficulty breathing from the pain and had to leave work to go home. This product just did not agree with my body and not worth the sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TAKE IF YOU HAVE A REGULAR CYCLE
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT take this if your cycle is regular. I took this and ovulated a week early. I then got a false positive on a pregnancy test and totally missed my period the next month. My doctor said the cause of all this must be the tea. I have now wasted a whole 2 months I could have been trying because of the tea.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but we'll see if it works
customer_reviews.text: This is getting a 5 star review for packaging and flavor. It's a tasty tea, the smell is nice, and I'd definitely purchase it again for those two factors alone (taste and packaging). But after seeing a specialist and having IUI after IUI fail...it's hard to imagine such a simple thing as TEA would help. But...cheers to hoping I'm wrong!
customer_reviews.author: M.E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stuff after having a miscarriage and wanting to see if anything would help conceive. Two months later today I have had a positive pregnancy test. On top of the product helping the company itself is amazing. I have spoke to them via email and they were so amazing and supportive and even personal and even offered to send me samples. So it felt like more than just a business transaction. It felt like family. I am so glad I found this brand and will continue to use the products.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I'm Pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: It worked! I believe this tea helped me relax enough to get pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if everything was just aligned for me to get pregnant.. or this really really works!! This was our very first time trying to get preggo, so i decided to get this. I drank it every other day or so because i always forget to make it. But now we are expecting our very first baby! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Nbg

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't drink if you ovulate regularly even if you have PCOS.
customer_reviews.text: This tea tasted amazing. I really enjoyed drinking it but unfortunately it stopped me from ovulating. I have PCOS but normally ovulate every month between CD 18-20. No confirmed ovulation by opks, ovusense and ovulation symptoms. I am disappointed. And I pray that I get my period on time and will ovulate next month. Its definitely not the tea for a woman who has regular cycles. Even if you have PCOS but have regular cycles and ovulate regularly. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Renee Angell

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a miscarriage back in February 2020. We are in the month of June 2020 and i purchased this The begging of June and started drinking it twice a day.... and now i am pregnant!!!!!!! We were subconsciously tryinf to get pregnant and we wouldn’t come out pregnant so i hought this for a little booster and it helped! I remember reading the reviews and seeing so many positive tests .. and now i am blessed to say we are expected! Best of luck!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Guzman

customer_reviews.title: IT FRIGGIN WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: So for starters, the first month I used this I got my positive pregnancy test! I had only been trying for two cycles before this. Im confident the tea helped with me conceiving! I also used Geritol & a prenatal vitamin along with ovulation tests to pinpoint ovulation! GIVE IT A TRY!! It tastes great too! I liked mine iced. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: marylacey

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be doing something for me.
customer_reviews.text: Been drinking this for a few days. It tastes like camomile tea. I've seen people say it is too sweet? I don't find it sweet at all. I think it could benefit from a little honey or sugar. I have been trying for 6 years to have another baby. I see a fertility specialist and there is nothing wrong with me other than being irregular and not ovulating. So im hoping this tea can set my cycle for me. I haven't had a period in over 100 days. After about 3 days of drinking this tea I noticed some spotting and cramping. It's still happening. No period yet. I'll update my review after a month of drinking this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hood

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant after 6 months of trying!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had been trying to conceive for 6 months with no luck. So I ordered this tea and started drinking one-two cups per day from the start of my cycle until a few days after ovulation. I got my positive test yesterday morning at 11dpo! Obviously I can’t say for certain that it was the tea, but it was the only thing I did differently this cycle so I’m guessing it definitely helped! I also really liked the taste of it and will look at other products by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Very promising results so far!
customer_reviews.text: Wifey and I have been trying to conceive for 2.5 years. My wife has a very erratic cycle which and to top it off, we recently started using ovulation detection tests and realized that my wife didn't even appear to be ovulating. We took a chance on this product and weirdly enough, we suddenly started getting positive ovulation tests and recently her cycle seems to be a bit more predictable. Not pregnant yet, but I will say that this tea has given us more hope in just a few months than we've had in s few years. Definitely going to keep on it until we hopefully conceive.
customer_reviews.author: David Downs

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Try!
customer_reviews.text: I just started the product the taste isn’t bad at all! I have to make myself drink three times a day and I bought the fertility for me . I appreciated your email and it’s absolutely right it’s takes two! TTC wasn’t a priority I just thought it would happen l, well 14 years later we are now in our 40’s and we don’t have any children. I have asked God why not us? But I believe in Jeremiah 29:11. My hopes that our Faith in Action will give us our hearts desires. Keep praying for us!
customer_reviews.author: Lachesha Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: BFP!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these products at first but after all the reviews and some research decided I would try the tea along with the fertility supplements. I typically have 32/33 day cycles ovulating around cycle day 19. the last few months have been whacky so I hoped it would help. Started both on Cycle day 1, ovulated 4 days early and got my BFP at 10 days passed ovulation !! We were on our 5th month of trying!!! Loved the taste and will definitely continue to use pink stork products !!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: good flavors
customer_reviews.text: good, mild blend of flavors. I do think it's a little on the sweet side, especially if you do a full-strength first brew of two. I've had better results with leaving the first brew's teabag halfway submerged in the water so some leaves stay dry. that makes the second brew about the same strength as the first. otherwise I was getting one strong and one weak cup of tea. I usually only drink one a day so I wanted balance.
customer_reviews.author: kaesechan

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: Pregnant after 2 months of using! We tried for 6 months over all and this definitely helped. Baby dust to all!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: This tea changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I am forever grateful for this tea. This tea helped me conceive my rainbow baby boy 💙 Try this tea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We were trying for 6 months to get pregnant using tracking and ovulation tests. I tried this around the time of my ovulation and got pregnant on my first try! The tea also tastes amazing and I will definitely be drinking it again next time I am trying for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Raichel & Adir

customer_reviews.title: re-usable..
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gone back to see if this spelled it out but there are 15 re-usable bags, so yes 30 servings, but who wants to keep a tea bag over night and the next day it is fairly weak. I feel like it served it's purpose, I was able to conceive, after I finish the one jar but who knows if this really played any roll in it..?
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help regulate my cycle and it has worked wonders!! For the past year my cycle has been OFF to say the least. It would last over 2 weeks and be spotty & late. After reading the reviews I was a little weary since I'm not trying to conceive and I do not have PCOS but let me tell you - IT WORKS!!! My cycle came in like it used to with a normal flow and everything!! I've never been so happy to get my period!! Also it tastes AMAZING so that's a plus! I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ari S

customer_reviews.title: Works Miracles and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews- I can honestly say the buyers are not exaggerating. I’ve been off of my mirena since January. I drank the tea and BOOM, PREGO! I believe the makers pray to God and He’s blessed this product... I don’t believe this was a coincidence
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: After three miscarriages, my husband and I were feeling hopeless and feared that our dream of starting a family would not come true. As a whim, I purchased this tea and the Fertility Lozenges (from the same company). We are now having our first successful pregnancy and saw our baby’s very strong heartbeat yesterday. Thank you for creating this line of products. This truly is an unexpected miracle for us.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worked!!
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY WORKS!!! This works amazing within a month of drinking it we found out we were pregnant, but sadly ended in a miscarriage at 7 weeks. I wasn’t ready just yet to try again, but it’s been a couple months and now I’m ready. I’m going to drink the tea and combine with the fertility sweets and prenatal pills to see how it goes. I would definitely suggest drinking it the first day of your period until the day after ovulation. That’s what I did and I usually drink it in one sitting. It’s easier that way, but hoping this product works for many women who are trying just like me.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha Garrett

product_meta.title: Pink Stork Fertility Tea: Sweet Mint, Raspberry Leaf Tea, 100% Organic, Fertility Tea for Women to Help Support Prenatal Vitamins + Hormones + Cycle, Women-Owned, 30 Cups
feature_bullets: NOURISHING: Fertility Tea to help support your body’s ovulation and natural reproductive cycle. Each pouch is stamped with the manufacturing and expiration date. Our teas expire two years from the date of manufacture.

PURE: We pride ourselves on organic and natural ingredients such as Peppermint + Chaste Tree Berry + Red Raspberry Leaf + Lady’s Mantle + More to support fertility. Refreshing Sweet Mint conception tea - enjoy it hot or cold! Please be mindful that this product may affect your ovulation and/or menstrual cycle.

FAITHFULLY FEMALE: We are the Wellness Brand for Women. Pink Stork's Founder & CEO is a woman and 75% of our employees are made up of women, so we know just what our customers need to take on womanhood.
GLORIFYING: Pink Stork honors God in everything we do. We strive to leave a positive impact on everyone we come in contact with through Acts of Service in our local, national, and global communities.
WHOLESOME: Our company and our products were created with our customers in mind. This product is made without GMOs, Gluten, Wheat, Dairy, Soy + More.
